data.text: That's not a knock on Capcom trying something new or whatever constraints were on development. I don't like playing UMVC3, but it's style/presentation is timeless.

Also reading that MVCI roster makes me feel like if they just dumped half of those new characters into the MVC3 engine with more stages it would still have official support, especially as DBFZ enters 4 gods + assists territory for the foreseeable future.

But seasons 2 and 3 offered a similar mixture of characters with a shoto, a grappler/big body, a zoner, a Final Fight character, and a simple command character (Ed/Falke) so we'll see if that continues.

Non SF5 characters in the top 20 include Makoto, Q,  Poison, Evil Ryu, Dudley, Dan, Fei Long, and Guy (also Skullomania from EXL). Personally would rather see Dan as a free bonus alongside Decapre and a major overhaul to regular Ryu instead of an Evil Ryu.

A lot of the voting in that poll was done to campaign for inclusion in that game (All four returning characters from season 3 are in the top 10, though Capcom already planned for them.) 

https://t.co/YOR1SSRrYO
